dc_description_s: Polygon file representing abandoned and vacant housing property as of January 2018 in Indianapolis and Marion County, Indiana.Vacant Property: A property is defined as vacant if there is no open health and hospital order and one of the following is true: o No electricity for more than 12 months o No water for more than 12 months o Open unsafe building order from BNS Abandoned Property : A property is defined as abandoned if it is vacant and one of the follow is true: o Open unsafe building order for longer than 6 months and there is no active permit o Open unsafe building order for longer than 6 months and one tax cycle delinquent o Two tax cycles or more delinquent Data projection: NAD 1983 StatePlane Indiana East FIPS 1301 (US Feet)
dc_creator_sm: City of Indianapolis and Marion County - IndyGIS
